QuestData.Title: Glaive Circumstances
QuestData.Description: I came here on a mission to slay the demon eredar, Azoran. During my infiltration, I was shot down from my felbat and captured.$b$bI'm not going to mince words, $n. Azoran plans to use the Burning Legion command ship to destroy Dalaran.$b$bTo stop him, I will need my warglaives that were lost during my fall from the sky. I would retrieve them myself, but I'm still weakened from my imprisonment.$b$bSearch for the warglaives on the northern side of the crater, where I was shot down.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you. Now that my warglaives are returned, I will bring ruin upon Felsoul Hold.$b$bMy wrath is unending and my vengeance swift.
